tosdr.case: Tracking via third-party cookies for other purposes without your consent.

title: Tracking via third-party cookies for other purposes without your consent.
quoteText:
We use different types of “cookies” (small text files that are placed on your device):

  • user input cookies;
  • authentication cookies;
  • cookies storing your preferences and settings;
  • performance cookies;
  • security (antifraud) cookies;
  • third party advertising cookies
